title: Installation had about 20 minutes left, then switched to negative timer.im

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Will the installer finish? or MUST it be restarted?

replies.body: Your network most likely lost it's connection with our servers if that install never finished. I'd suggest restarting it, but this time **run it as admin and disable any firewalls while it installs**. If this doesn't help, go ahead and shoot a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our techies.
